editionStmt.p: The initial version of this file was created from data kindly provided by the Ethiopic Manuscript Imaging Project directed by Steve Delamarter.

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

licence.p: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msContents.summary: F-xxx: Miracles of Mary, Tä’ammǝrä Maryam, ተአምረ፡ ማርያም፡ The standard works on the miracles of Mary are Cerulli, Maria, and Budge, Mary. An exhaustive collection has been published in Ethiopia, Tä’ammǝrä Maryam (Addis Ababa: Tǝnśa’e zä-guba’e, 1989 E.C.) EMML 2058, 2059, and 2060. See Delamarter, et al, MYS 1 for a description of 371 miracles. F-4r: Introduction to the Miracles of Mary, ስምዑ፡ እነግረክሙ፡. F-13r: Vision of John, Son of Thunder, on the Dual Virginity of Mary, ራዕየ፡ ተአምር። ዘዮሐንስ፡ ወልደ፡ ነጐድጓድ፡. For a critical edition and English translation, see Getatchew Haile, The Mariology of Emperor Zär’a Ya‘ǝqob of Ethiopia, OCA 242 (Rome: Pontificium Institutum Studiorum Orientalium, 1992), esp. 70–93. EMIP 154. F-15r: One miracle of Mary about the five dolors. mentions owner, ገብረ ማርያም, and scribe, ገብረ ኢየሱስ. Varia: F-16v: Reading from the Acts of the Apostles and from the Gospel of Mark
